scripts.build: node -e "if (process.env.TURBO_BUILD_CLI === '1' || process.env.FORCE_CLI_BUILD === '1') { const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); const res = spawnSync('cargo', ['build'], { stdio: 'inherit' }); if (res.error) { console.error('cargo build failed:', res.error); process.exit(res.status || 1); } } else { console.log('Skipping cli build (Cargo builds inside Docker). Set TURBO_BUILD_CLI=1 to force local build.'); }"
